champagneZwick1121 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Volume Calculation for uniroot

    volume_function_uniroot.Rd

    Volume Calculation for uniroot

    volume_function_uniroot(b, target_volume)

    Arguments

    b

    Upper limit for the integration, which defines the level of Champagne in the glass.

    target_volume

    A numeric value specifying the target volume for calculations.

    Value

    The difference between the calculated volume of the Champagne glass and the target volume.

    Author

    Nicolas Zwickert

    Examples

    x <- seq(0, 20, by = 0.1)
V_function(x)
